name: Kolbo Studio v1.0.1
body:
## Kolbo Studio v1.0.1

### What's New
- Bug fixes and improvements

### Features
- Split View: View two tabs side-by-side with 50/50 and 70/30 presets
- State Persistence: Your tabs and layout are saved between sessions
- Auto-Updates: Manual download updater - downloads installer to your Downloads folder
- Cross-Platform: Windows and Mac support

### Installation
1. Download the installer below
2. Run the installer
3. Launch Kolbo Studio

### System Requirements
- Windows: Windows 10 or later (64-bit)
- Mac: macOS 10.13 or later (Intel and Apple Silicon)
